about:

Hago esto porque me encanta la idea de ayudar a mis clientes a conseguir sus objetivos y aumentar la visibilidad de su marca mediante mis diseños. Creo en el diseño sostenible, inclusivo e igualitario y siempre aplico esta filosofía en mis trabajos.
  Manejo software de Adobe (Illustrator, Indesign, Photoshop, XD, Premiere) y utilizo Wordpress para hacer mis diseños web

about:
I am a graphic and web designer with 6 years of experience.
  I create original and amazing works. I am always responsible and creative in achieving my goal.
  I work with Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator:
  ⮚ Illustrations
  ⮚ Book & Podcast cover
  ⮚ Logo
  ⮚ Photomanipulation
  ⮚ Infographics
  ⮚ Retouching and more.
  I'm almost always in touch and I'll take all your wishes into account.
  Work with me, and I will make your assignment magical.

about:
Make it simple, but significant
  That's the motto I work by. Designs have the power to change the way you view everything in your life. Words are often not enough to express your thoughts and sometimes you just need a visual representation of the way you feel. To fulfill all those needs and more, here we are, to breathe life into what matters the most, your thoughts and dreams.

about:
Welcome to my profile. My name is Szekeres László and I'm a graphic designer, with many years of experience. I live in the beautiful city of Oradea, Romania, with my even more beautiful wife, Henrietta:). My "designer career" started when I was 4 and I drew tons of cows and horses..^^ Since then I developed my ability, until graphic design became my passion and my job as well.
  If you like my works and you are interested in logo or stationary design, feel free to contact me.

about: Hey!  I'm Artmin, I am a Graphic Designer specializing in Illustrations and identity design. I've been exploring and experimenting with creative art since I was a child. I enjoy new and challenging projects that push and challenge me to evolve and learn in the field of design. I've had a lot of exposure in the field of design and have been working professionally for the past 6 years. I create clean, fun and appealing designs which comply with the latest design standards.

about: Hello, I'm Muhammad Shahbaz, a 39 years old independent graphic designer specialized in logo and identity design. I have more than 10 year experience working on logo projects from all over the globe. My work is passion fueled combination of focused design thinking, attention to details and conceptual simplicity driven by my love for creativity and bringing ideas into existence.

about: Hello, my name is Ana, design is my passion. I specialize in corporate logo-brand design and photo manipulation. I also take care of designing all kinds of advertising material, labels, packaging, ers. I am a professional graphic artist and designer with a master's degree in visual arts and more than 7 years of experience. Master in Marketing and Advertising for 15 years.

about: I've been a Graphic Designer for the past 23 years now, and have been freelance for the last 10. I've previously worked in many genres of design, gaining a vast array of experience. These have included a print studio, a banner firm and an Architect firm, covering everything from logos to large format, hand sketching to vector design. I am very passionate about my work, and love how every new project is completely different, it’s what keeps the job so enjoyable!
